subject: Horse Racing
Veterinary Medicine
Alternative and Complementary Medicine
Medicine and Health
Barbaro (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: A rising number of therapies — both alternative and high-tech — are being used to keep racehorses happy, healthy and, hopefully, fast.
snippet: A rising number of therapies — both alternative and high-tech — are being used to keep racehorses happy, healthy and, hopefully, fast.
